title: The Key To Your New Home Awaits You!!!!
map_address: 701 Mt. Zion Rd near Tara Blvd
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Welcome to Park at Mt. Zion.', 'Our two and three bedroom apartments and townhomes offer lots of space to make your home comfortable.', 'Each home features a full size washer & dryer, a spacious kitchen, large windows with tons of natural lighting, private entrances and convenient parking.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Private Patio Or Balcony', '- Professional On-Site Management Team', '- Full-Size Washer & Dryer', 'In EVERY Home!', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '- Open & Spacious Floor Plans', '- Central Heating & Air-Conditioning', '- High Speed Internet Access', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', 'Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Park at Mt. Zion participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $41,700 | 2 Occupants: $47,640 | 3', 'Occupants: $53,580 | 4 Occupants: $59,520 | 5 Occupants: $64,320 | 6', 'Occupants: $69,060.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-2:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Park at Mt Zion', '701 Mt. Zion Road', 'Jonesboro, GA, 30236', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'EoLc618pXlv']
